00025 #define SQR(x) ((x)*(x))
00026 
00027 
00028 int initAngintegration(angintegrationpara* par, const char* projpar)
00029 {
00030   char projparcpy[strlen(projpar)];
00031   strcpy(projparcpy, projpar);
00032   char* c = projparcpy;
00033         
00034   c = strtok(c, "-");
00035 
00036   if (!strncmp(c, "ang", 3)) {
00037     c=strtok(NULL, "-");
00038     if (!strncmp(c, "none", 4)) {
00039       par->type = AngNone;
00040       par->n = 1;
00041     } else if (!strncmp(c, "zcw", 3)) {
00042       par->type = AngZCW;
00043       c=strtok(NULL, "-");
00044       par->zcw.idx = atoi(c);
00045       par->n = nangles3(par->zcw.idx);
00046     } else {
00047       par->type = AngProd;
00048       int nbeta = atoi(c);
00049       c=strtok(NULL, "-");
00050       int nazimuth = atoi(c);
00051 
00052       par->n = nbeta*SQR(nazimuth);
00053 
00054       par->prod.nbeta = nbeta;
00055       par->prod.beta = malloc(nbeta*sizeof(double));
00056       par->prod.wbeta = malloc(nbeta*sizeof(double));
00057       GaussLegendrePoints(nbeta, -1.0, 1.0, par->prod.beta, par->prod.wbeta);
00058     
00059       par->prod.nalpha = nazimuth;
00060       par->prod.alpha = malloc(nazimuth*sizeof(double));
00061       par->prod.walpha = malloc(nazimuth*sizeof(double));
00062       double shift = 0.25;
00063       ShiftedPeriodicTrapezoidalPoints(nazimuth, 0, 2*M_PI, shift,
00064                                        par->prod.alpha, par->prod.walpha);
00065 
00066       par->prod.ngamma = nazimuth;
00067       par->prod.gamma = par->prod.alpha;
00068       par->prod.wgamma = par->prod.walpha;
00069 
00070     }
00071   }
00072 
00073   return 0;
00074 }

00077 void freeAngintegration(angintegrationpara* par)
00078 {
00079   if(par->type == AngProd) {
00080     free(par->prod.beta);
00081     free(par->prod.wbeta);
00082     free(par->prod.alpha);
00083     free(par->prod.walpha);
00084   }
00085 }

00088 // workspace
00089 static SlaterDet Qpp;
00090 static SlaterDetAux Xpp;
00091 
00092 double _estimateangkappa(const SlaterDet* Q)
00093 {
00094   const double cosb0 = 0.5;
00095 
00096   double ovl0;
00097   complex double ovlcosb0;
00098    
00099   // do we have to (re)initialize workspace first ?
00100   if (Qpp.A < Q->A) {
00101     initSlaterDet(Q, &Qpp);
00102     initSlaterDetAux(Q, &Xpp);
00103   }
00104 
00105   copySlaterDet(Q, &Qpp);
00106   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &Qpp, &Xpp);
00107   ovl0 = Xpp.ovlap;
00108 
00109   rotateSlaterDet(&Qpp, 0.0,acos(cosb0),0.0);
00110   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &Qpp, &Xpp);
00111   ovlcosb0 = Xpp.ovlap;
00112 
00113   return (log(cabs(ovlcosb0/ovl0))/log(cosb0));
00114 }

00117 // kappacrit
00118 static double kappacrit = 25.0;
00119 
00120 void _setangkappacrit(double kappa)
00121 {
00122   kappacrit = kappa;
00123 }
00124 
00125 double _getangkappacrit()
00126 {
00127   return (kappacrit);
00128 }

00130 
00131 void _initangintegration(const Projection* P, 
00132                          double kappa,
00133                          Symmetry S, Symmetry Sp,
00134                          angintegrationpara* par)
00135 {
00136   par->type = P->ang;
00137 
00138   if (P->ang == AngNone) {
00139     par->n = 1;
00140   }
00141 
00142   else if (P->ang == AngZCW) {
00143     par->zcw.idx = P->angzcw.idx;
00144     par->n = nangles3(P->angzcw.idx);
00145   }
00146 
00147   else if (P->ang == AngProd || P->ang == AngProdA) {
00148     int nbeta = P->angprod.nbeta;
00149     int nazim = P->angprod.nazimuth;
00150 
00151     // use Gauss-Legendre integration for cos(beta)
00152     // if overlap is very strongly peaked, use Gauss-Exponential 
00153 
00154     if (hasSymmetry(S, spherical))
00155       par->prod.nbeta = 1;
00156     else        
00157       par->prod.nbeta = nbeta;    
00158 
00159     par->prod.beta = malloc(par->prod.nbeta*sizeof(double));
00160     par->prod.wbeta = malloc(par->prod.nbeta*sizeof(double));
00161 
00162     if (kappa < kappacrit)
00163       GaussLegendrePoints(par->prod.nbeta, -1.0, 1.0, par->prod.beta, par->prod.wbeta);
00164     else
00165       GaussExponentialPoints(par->prod.nbeta, -1.0, 1.0, kappa, par->prod.beta, par->prod.wbeta);
00166 
00167     // azimuthal integration can be skipped if symmetry allows
00168     // trapezoidal rule with shifted grid points
00169     // special handling for rotatez2, rotatez3 ?
00170     double shift = 0.25;
00171 
00172     if (hasAxialSymmetry(S))
00173       par->prod.nalpha = 1;
00174     else
00175       par->prod.nalpha = nazim;
00176 
00177     par->prod.alpha = malloc(par->prod.nalpha*sizeof(double));
00178     par->prod.walpha = malloc(par->prod.nalpha*sizeof(double));
00179 
00180     ShiftedPeriodicTrapezoidalPoints(par->prod.nalpha, 0, 2*M_PI, shift,
00181                                      par->prod.alpha, par->prod.walpha);
00182 
00183     if (hasAxialSymmetry(Sp))
00184       par->prod.ngamma = 1;
00185     else
00186       par->prod.ngamma = nazim;
00187 
00188     par->prod.gamma = malloc(par->prod.ngamma*sizeof(double));
00189     par->prod.wgamma = malloc(par->prod.ngamma*sizeof(double));
00190 
00191     ShiftedPeriodicTrapezoidalPoints(par->prod.ngamma, 0, 2*M_PI, shift,
00192                                      par->prod.gamma, par->prod.wgamma);
00193 
00194     par->n = par->prod.nbeta* par->prod.nalpha* par->prod.ngamma;
00195   }
00196 }

00199 static inline double dmin(double a, double b)
00200 {
00201   return (a < b ? a : b);
00202 }
00203 
00204 
00205 // What's the proper criterium for switchung to Gauss-Exponential ?
00206 // has been overlap <Q|R(beta)|Qp>
00207 // this does not work for Gamow-Teller and Spectroscopic Amplitudes
00208 // now use min(<Q|R(beta)|Q>, <Qp|R(beta)|Qp>)
00209 
00210 void initangintegration(const Projection* P, 
00211                         const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00212                         Symmetry S, Symmetry Sp,
00213                         angintegrationpara* par)
00214 {
00215   double kappa = 0.0; 
00216   if (P->ang == AngProdA) {
00217     kappa = dmin(_estimateangkappa(Q), _estimateangkappa(Qp));
00218     fprintf(stderr, "kappa: %8.3f\n", kappa);
00219   }
00220 
00221   _initangintegration(P, kappa,  S, Sp, par);
00222 }
00223 
00224 
00225 void reinitangintegration(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00226                           Symmetry S, Symmetry Sp,
00227                           angintegrationpara* par)
00228 {
00229   // we only have to modify something for adaptive integration
00230 
00231   // use Gauss-Legendre integration for cos(beta)
00232   // if overlap is very strongly peaked, use Gauss-Exponential 
00233 
00234   double kappa = 0.0;
00235 
00236   if (par->type == AngProdA) {
00237 
00238     kappa = dmin(_estimateangkappa(Q), _estimateangkappa(Qp));
00239     fprintf(stderr, "estimated kappa: %8.3f\n", kappa);
00240 
00241     if (kappa < kappacrit)
00242       GaussLegendrePoints(par->prod.nbeta, -1.0, 1.0, par->prod.beta, par->prod.wbeta);
00243     else
00244       GaussExponentialPoints(par->prod.nbeta, -1.0, 1.0, kappa, par->prod.beta, par->prod.wbeta);
00245 
00246   }
00247 }

00249 
00250 void getangintegrationpoint(int i, const angintegrationpara* par,
00251                             double* alpha, double* beta, double* gamma, 
00252                             double* w)
00253 {
00254   assert(i < par->n);
00255 
00256   if (par->type == AngNone) {
00257     *alpha = 0.0; *beta = 0.0; *gamma = 0.0;
00258     *w = 8*SQR(M_PI);
00259   }
00260 
00261   else if (par->type == AngZCW) {
00262     getangles3(par->zcw.idx, i, alpha, beta, gamma);
00263     *w = 8*SQR(M_PI)/par->n;
00264   }
00265 
00266   else if (par->type == AngProd || par->type == AngProdA) {
00267     int ibeta, ialpha, igamma;
00268     
00269     ibeta = i % par->prod.nbeta;
00270     ialpha = (i/par->prod.nbeta) % par->prod.nalpha;
00271     igamma = i/(par->prod.nbeta*par->prod.nalpha);
00272 
00273     *beta = acos(par->prod.beta[ibeta]);
00274     *alpha = par->prod.alpha[ialpha];
00275     *gamma = par->prod.gamma[igamma];
00276     *w = par->prod.wbeta[ibeta]*
00277       par->prod.walpha[ialpha]*par->prod.wgamma[igamma];
00278   }
00279     
00280   // fprintf(stderr, "ang integration point: (%8.5f, %8.5f, %8.5f) weight %8.5f\n", 
00281   //         *alpha, *beta, *gamma, *w);
00282 }
